website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly shoe cabinet that you'll be able to put together quickly and use to organize many pairs of shoes. However, the trade-offs are some longevity concerns.
pros: Trim build can fit in tight spaces, including some closets
Has 10 adjustable shelves that can accommodate as many as 45 pairs
cons: Woven material is somewhat flimsy and prone to rips

website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you like its spacious design, but it's not practical if you don't have a lot of vertical space to spare.
pros: Organizes up to 45 pairs of shoes with its space-saving 10-tier design
Provides a zippered dust cover,  lightweight construction and easy no-tool assembly
cons: It's on the higher end of the price spectrum, but it has a lot to offer for the price

customer_reviews.title: Again - I am in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: Here's some pictures to update my review. Again - I am in love with this product ! It was very much needed, and it is of very good quality !
customer_reviews.author: Katdonado

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Exactly what we were looking for! 😀
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Came ahead of schedule! Easy and simple to put together. Took me and my husband about 30-40 mins to put together. Seems sturdy and fit all kinds of shoes including: ankle boots, tennis shoes, flats, high heels, kids shoes, and high boots (folded over), etc... It worked perfectly for the space saver and organizer I was looking for. It did measure a few inches taller than measurements gave in description but still worked for us. The bottom isn't as sturdy as we would like but it does look like it will hold up as long as it doesn't have to much weight. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf based on the reasonably good reviews and the price which seemed also reasonable. When I tried to assemble the shelf two pieces broke while only applying moderate pressure to stack them together. I returned the item right away. I would not recommend the item, it is too flimsy to last.
customer_reviews.author: Cat I am

customer_reviews.title: A note of praise for great customer service...
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, this item's a gem. For the price, it offers great shoe storage with an intelligent design that's lightweight yet sturdy, clearly durable, and easy to assemble. Definitely worth five stars. Equally importantly, SONGMICS customer support was great. My unit came with one less rod than was needed to finish the assembly. The whole process of raising the issue and getting a rod shipped out to me was super-easy, cordial, and the customer support agent seemed genuinely committed to resolving the problem. Kudos for the support! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bender

customer_reviews.title: hard to beat for functionality and looks
customer_reviews.text: Product did the trick. Nice looking and simple way to get stuff out of your way.You may find the zipper to break after a few years. Also, the aluminum rods that create the structure are not going to handle hardly any abuse. UPDATE: I fixed the ziipper problem using replacement zipper kit. Warning: Put this thing on wheels. If yo try to move it, it will break. I will attach a picture of a steel wire shelving kit that solved this issue.
customer_reviews.author: David Boettin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is garbage. The material covering the rack ripped when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. The material covering the rack ripped when I was putting it together, and the plastic rodsdo not stay together. If you look at tithe wrong way it will collapse. I didn't return it because it was so big and bulky I couldn't be bothered. :(
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was great, but after adding enough shoes to fill it, it became unstable. I came home from work to find the entire shoe rack on the floor with shoes everywhere. Many of the connectors broke, but still managed to get the rack upright. Now I have a heavy chair sitting in front of it to keep it from possibly landing on my animals if I am gone. Not really worth the hassle to buy this shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Pettyjohn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage room
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble and holds all my shoes and boy do I have a lot. My only negative is in my room I have carpet and I’m not sure if that makes a difference but I do notice the stand leaning forward, before shoes were on and after. It’s like the top was 5 inches away from the wall and the bottom was right up against the wall. I did place a piece of rubber under the front two legs and it helped a little but it still leans at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Shalon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for putting away all my dressy sandals and shoes that I rarely wear. I was also able to fit clutches and small purses. Keeps them covered and dust free. Assembly was annoying, but wasn’t hard. (Just make sure you pay attention to the holes on the plastic pieces - their placement is important.)
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, it was really easy to put together, looks good. Only complaint is that the "shelves" are not the best the material is shorter than the poles so it takes away space for more shoes and for heels this material doesn't get firm enough to hold them upright. Over all it is a good shoe rack and if I need another one I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S

customer_reviews.title: Useful For Yarn Storage!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this was purchased for my yarn because I have a cat and needed whatever it was stored on needed to be covered. The packaging was phenomenal and complete. The material of covering is like those clothing covers or suit travels - kinda like paper cloth. The "shelving" material pieces appear to be the same, but sealed with a plastic film for strength. Putting it together: Once you do one, it's repetitive. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Will buy another!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I got this shoe rack! I have so many shoes in boxes and for me if I can’t actually see the shoe it doesn’t exist. I really like the sturdiness of the shelf and that my heels don’t fall over. Mine does have a tiny rip in the dust cover, I’m not sure if it came like that or if my husband just got a little too aggressive when putting it together (which by the way is super easy to do). I’m assuming it’s his fault lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera M.

customer_reviews.title: Leave shoes in the box and stack them on top of each other, that might be a little sturdier!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together but after all the shoes were put on it became very unstable. By the next day it had tipped over. After fixing it and making sure only the light shoes were on the top 4 shelves the same thing happened. Now some of the plastic piece that concept have bent. It now leans way over and only able to use it if something heavy is prompted up in front of it atleast 1/3 of the way up and it is against the wall. It’s now hid in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: love me

customer_reviews.title: neutral buy
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ass to assemble. I followed the reviews and the directions, but they don't stay that well input. But once you get it assembled, it stays intact. Very poor stitching, as most of the stitching came out, and they tent to be wider than the picture where you can't close it nicely balanced. And the parts are cheap. I broke few of the connectors, and they're super easy to break. But they're for your shoes. I might have messed up, but if you do it right, this is by far the best deal online. That's why it's not one star.
customer_reviews.author: plokivos

customer_reviews.title: This will hold twice as many shoes as it states
customer_reviews.text: You have to pay attention when putting this together as you can screw it up and the shelves can tear trying to fix it. However, it does hold twice as many shoes as it says it does, depending on the shoes. I have tennis shoes, flats, and low heels. All of those can be stacked. Since this isn't very wide it is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Overn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really surprised by the stability of this product. I thought for sure it was gonna be flimsy but nope! And my husband has large, size 17 shoes and it holds up perfect. The only thing I will say is there is a bit of trial and error with the assembly, though generally straightforward, the direction of the joints matter if you don’t want it to be lopsided. Wish that had been clearer in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: TheBuffster

customer_reviews.title: I only wish more room in between racks
customer_reviews.text: I really love the shoe rack was easy to put together and looks great my only issue was that with my heels there was really not enough space I have six inch heels and standing up straight they were pressing against the fabric at the top of them lucky thing I only have a few really wasn't a big issue I just lay them down but just would have loved the aesthetic of them standing straight up
customer_reviews.author: Rica Hankerson

customer_reviews.title: could be sturdier but it works
customer_reviews.text: it’s VERY easy to assemble. unless everything you’re storing is a pair of slippers, putting shoes on every level will cause the shoe rack to be weighed down a little bit. spreading them apart and using every other level will make it easier. that being said, it’s not really for 45 shoes. regardless, i still recommend it. it’s cute and get the job done. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Smoky Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sagging Non-Woven Fabric Shelves
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Pretty easy to put together, no tools. Definitely useful, efficient, I have many shoes. It looks neat and organized. The cover is nice, attractive both closed and open. CONS: Non-woven Fabric for the shelves feels like paper made out of plastic. It is so thin, it tears easily while building it. Also, it CANNOT hold the weight of one pair of shoes (nevertheless 5 pairs per shelf as advertised) without sagging. Shoes such as heels fall over side ways because the shelf material sags. I will have to buy some thin wood composite pieces to place atop of each shelf so shoes can sit on shelf without falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Castro

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: this shoe rack is outstanding -- excellent ventilation to control the moisture, takes little space, and good-looking. I was surprised by the stability of the rack after built it up. Individual rod looks cheap, but once you connect everything to build the shoe rack, the final product is just outstanding. Also, I love the fact this rack prevents dust from accumulating on top of my precious shoes.
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe that I bought this one. Terrible quality, very unstable, the only good thing is about easy to assemble. This price is amazing, I had a similar one(more stable) when I used work in China, and its only 5 dollars. Unbelievable price here, shame shame shame.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah, this is what you want.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I wish I would have bought one a looooong time ago. It made our laundry room look so much neater. Yeah, there's a big grey fixture now but at least shoes are now fully covered and protected from dust. I love it! Oh yeah, putting it together IS a bit of a tedious chore. Please, please pay attention to what you are doing. Once you get the build going and you realize that a mistake was made, you'll have to be careful not to crack the joint plastics when you try to undo it. You'll see what I mean. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hermann Steidel

customer_reviews.title: cheaply lined material
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad. The cover is a cheap material. My cat climbed it and ripped a hole in it instantly. Aside from that it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but defective
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack would have been awesome (and gotten five stars) had the cover not been ripped. It's easy to put together, sturdy, and seemingly well made. Unfortunately after I added the final touch (the cover) I noticed a big rip in the back. It's returnable, but I already stocked it with my shoes and don't want to go through the hassle of disassembling and trying to repackage it. Updated review to five stars after seller immediately resolved my issue upon my initial review.
customer_reviews.author: Tallie

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product. Sturdy, easy to put together (after a rough few minutes of figuring out the pieces). Love that it has a small footprint in my house as opposed to most shoe organizers. It’s tall and slim, and holds dozens of shoes. I have corgi’s and they shed a lot, but no hair gets into this. Very, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mojomol

customer_reviews.title: overall great product, its gonna save you space
customer_reviews.text: great product, easy to assemble and very versatile, it is a great option to organize those shoes or boxes we have no space for. my only two dislikes are; first, the plastic connectors should be thicker adding more resistance and sturdiness to them and also the fabric that serves as platform in every tier should be thicker and more sturdy as well but i just got my product so let's test its durability and resistance, do not over load it with heavy stuff and be careful when installing the plastic connectors since they may crack or break
customer_reviews.author: Deyvi N, Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Fits inside of closet
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe storage. Purchased a few months ago and finally put it together. I love this because it fit right into my hallway closet allowing more space in my bedroom closet. Easy to assemble. Fits perfectly, sturdy made of good quality. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna C

customer_reviews.title: Will organize both shoes and boots!
customer_reviews.text: Good for a family of three with a lot of shoes and boots. I left out the front pole in each of the bottom two levels for boots, and it’s sturdy. It’ll fit three to five boots on each level depending on the sizes and how you fit them in. I like that it has a dust cover. This is a cheap quality, delicate fabric kit; but it definitely will do the job if you’ve been looking to finally organize your footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: this is like the best thing EVER
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G.!!! this is like the best thing EVER!! Slapped this together in about 10 minutes ( and I HATE!! putting things together!! ). Fit in my coat closet by the door perfect and I am not hunting for shoes. I need a few more of these ( yes I have shoe issues!! ). I need more closets for them first!! It holds everything from Boots, to booties, and flip flops to dress shoes!! BUY it you will LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good product-Performs it’s function!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, priced right and acceptable quality. A little on the light duty side and I therefore needed to screw it to the wall in my closet and it now works fine. Neat fact-you can merely leave several shelves off if you need a lower height rack for your space!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Really Love this Item
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack has moved with me to three different apartments and is still holding strong. It fits at least 50 pairs of my shoes on it and I wear a size 10. I do have a small tear in the lining because once it is full it is very hard to move it to another location. The assembly is my only complaint, the small connectors are very tight and it took about 40 minutes for me to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: BriAnn Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great for extra storage of anything light, from shoes to tshirts, towels etc. And light enough that when empty can be moved anywhere. Debated on a nice piece of furniture of this. For the price, get one. You can use it for anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Side display fits 3 Jordans, otherwise 4 fit with heels facing out.
customer_reviews.text: Would love to get the individual transparent sneaker bins that Songmics has but my living situation is a bit tight at this moment. This set-up turned out better than expected though. Will have to turn the shoes the other way to accommodate 4 pairs each row once it gets full displayed this way. Note: Shoe size men's 8.5. The Jordan 5's barely fit as they are a bulkier shoe than the 1's. Highly recommended shoe rack. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: The Phenomenal One

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I was also concerned on the stability of this product, but once shoes are added, it gets more and more stable. We love it! Can still zip closed with size 12 mens shoes. I was putting it together and thought I was missing a couple of connectors and contacted customer service. It was MY error since the top and bottom of the rack actually had different connectors than the rest of the unit. Customer service was great and immediately sent out the parts I said were missing. Will definitely purchase/recommend this product AND company!
customer_reviews.author: Charles sabino

customer_reviews.title: Horrible horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible quality. Flimsy to infinity. Not worth 10$ also and they charge 40$!!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoe Rack Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been through quite a few shoe racks as no shoes are allowed inside the home. Also to keep shoes organized as best as possible and this shoe rack is hands down my favorite. The height, width, and how easy it was to build has left me satisfied. I would recommend to be very careful when placing the cover on the entire shoe rack. It slightly got caught on the corner and I tugged too hard so the cover ripped, however that was my fault. If you want to keep your shoes, heels, etc. organized neatly I would definitely say this shoe rack is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The shoe rack was easy to assemble. But the fabric cover is so thin that when I went to put it over the structure, it tore very easily. It's basically made of paper. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I read several reviews stating missing parts but others said things were fine so I took the gamble and lost
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts!!! The side rods between the layers that make it actually stack were not even in the shipment. I read several reviews stating missing parts but others said things were fine so I took the gamble and lost. I don't have time to return it so I'm out the money...what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for my closet space
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my closet space. Held about 60 pairs of boots, sandals, slippers, tennis shoes and others. Sturdy and very easy to put together. Just a warning-be careful of you have to remove or adjust the plastic corner pieces. I had to turn a few around because I put them on wrong and one broke and one cracked pretty easily. There was one extra piece in the pack so that helped. Other than that=no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RICKEY ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and love them! I’m a single woman and wasn’t sure if I was going to need a handyman. However, the box wasn’t too heavy and the actual item was broken down into easy to fit pieces. The first one took me about 45 minutes and the second one - I was a pro! Ha! Probably 20 minutes or less. I absolutely love my shoe tiers. It fits average to a litttle longer shoe box. The width doesn’t really matter. I’m super happy with my tiers and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, and pretty lightweight without the shoes of course! I got the 10 tiers one in grey and thought that I would have enough to fill it up but I don't. ( Me buying and not reading the fine print) but its super big and great for people with families that have lots of shoes. Be careful putting on the cover though cause I was rushing to put it all together and it ripped a little but it's not too noticeable! But all in all, I love it and it was just was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Babyytop

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Able to put all my shoes, my toddler size and my husband sizes in here with space to spare. Great. My husband broke the zipper 🤦🏾‍♀️ But still amazing product my husband is heavy handed lol
customer_reviews.author: Amirah Pettus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will be buying another. Very sturdy and plus point it’s waterproof. Can hold up to 4 or 5 pairs on each shelf. Love that it can be closed off so dirt can’t get it, and everything gets hidden. Assembly was fast, my eight year old put it together!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together. Hides the mess of a regular shoe rack. Felt sturdier than expected (rungs are metal, coupling is plastic). The only issue I have is with the cover. There is no velcro, so when unzipped, it can't be rolled up and secured like in the picture. Also, only 1 of the 4 corners had a string on it to secure to the bottom. Still works for my needs, just not exactly what they show...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline G Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive easy to hide storage!
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived I wasnt confident. There poles & plastic connectors & fabric shelves. But, it went together fast, has more room than I expected, is pretty sturdy & very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had this for my shoes, however within about 6 months the seam and zipper tore all the way down on both sides. I took the time to sew it back up and ripped again. Poor quality. I haven't checked yet, but I will have to look to see if I could just purchase the outside cover so zipper up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Motley

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap product.  Be aware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product. Cannot hold 30 pairs of shoes. Collapsed in first use.
customer_reviews.author: Suraj

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product...I am beyond satisfied with this product I put this together in about an hour..It’s amazing that it’s so light weight yet extremely sturdy ..I fit about 75 pairs of shoes Including boots .. I highly recommend it. !now my shoes are organized in one place..thank you for making such terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly organize your shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble; I love the cover that keeps the shoes hidden and neat; holds ALL of my shoes which surprised me! The size is accurately defined in description; I love this much better than a behind-the-door shoe rack. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Functional/Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Assembly takes time! But I didn't care. I was after functional, cheap and not hideous and this was just that.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: great for organizing and seeing at a glance what shoes i have
customer_reviews.text: I always kept my shoes in shoe boxes. so i never really knew what was in most of them. i wore the same pairs all the time. I keep this shoe organizer at the foot of my basement stairs where it is most convenient for me. i wish i would have purchased this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: L64

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, took me about 10 minutes. Easy to break apart to move to a new house or college dorm. I use it as a closet as mine is full of boxes and miscellaneous.
customer_reviews.author: Hell019

customer_reviews.title: These racks are way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bomb!! I put 4 in spare empty room and was able to get all my shoes and boots in. All my friends are jealous. These racks are way better than I expected. They are very sturdy and easy to put together but, it takes a lot time to put together but well worth it. That zippered front closure is so great for keeping dust and pets off your shoes. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and sturdy enough. Kind of a pain to put together but super easy. Just need the patience to sit for a bit and sna all the plastic pieces together and thread the panels on. My size 11 shoes fit pretty well, and I used some extra top shelves to store some extra linens. Happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: trvin

customer_reviews.title: Clean and easy shoe storage.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. A great shoe stooges capable of holding a tad more on top, but could be sturdier. Really easy to set up and I love how it’s not a huge object.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Quality!  Looks great and is an organization dream!!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived promptly and was actually much better quality than I expected. Heavy sneakers have not caused shelves to bow yet!! Purchased for my teenaged son, who has an extensive wardrobe/athletic shoe collection. He's a boy, so he handles things kinda rough, but this is sturdy and holds everything neatly in place. Great color. Doesn't take up as much space as I initially thought. Plan to order an additional rack in another color for my pre-teen.
customer_reviews.author: That Girlie

customer_reviews.title: Hell no.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this package was TERRIBLE. They didn’t even bother to place everything in a box or at least keep all the pieces together. I’m missing 5 short poles — meaning I only have a 7 tier shoe rack which is NOT what I paid for. The used tape to piece my box together instead of getting a new box so the hole in the one tier is because the tape ripped it off When I tried to open it. Terrible experience
customer_reviews.author: Milan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack is the bomb. It held shoes from three separate racks plus a host of shoe boxes sitting on a high closet shelf. Now I have easy access to all my shoes. I was able to fit five pair on each row plus our motorcycle boots on the top shelf. It was easy to put together and once assembled, it was sturdier than I could have ever imagined. The best money ever spent on shoe racks.
customer_reviews.author: wine4jac

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my shoes. It is a good size and holds a lot of shoes but doesn't take too much space. I give it 4 stars because there were defective pieces and some pieces missing but Amazon fulfilled that so it was good.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be WAY better than I thought it would be. It's very sturdy and holds lots of shoes. I didn't expect it to be the quality it is. Thank you exactly what I wanted and needed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trishee

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: instructions are easy to follow but somewhat challenging to get done, my hands were red and tired after assembling it. on the good note I like its sturdiness and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe rack. I have it completely filled and it is still super sturdy. I assembled it quickly and easily!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack was a lot bigger than expected, but it fit all of my shoes and my husband’s shoes. We were able to fit four pairs of shoes in each row, and in the bottom two rows we put shoeboxes, which only fit three each. Overall, this thing is pretty awesome especially since it has the cover which prevents dust, cause I hated dusting my shoes when I didn’t wear them often. Tip: it’s very flimsy when you first put it together, but once you put your shoes in place, it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: This may be “dustproof” and “waterproof” (for a little while), but it can’t truly withstand much wear and tear if placed outside. We’ve only had ours for about 6 months and as you can see, it’s literally falling apart. It’s under the awning, so it hasn’t been exposed to direct rain or sunlight. I’m now suspicious as to how this product has a 4.5 star rating across so many reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen K Yu

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this shoe rack, it has so much storage and gives me so much space being tall. The sturdiness of it is great! You have to really pay attention to the small details on set up, I had to re start and undo work cause I didn't pay attention. Other than that I get so many compliments on it. Its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Damarise Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how well it would stand up to shoes, but this does a bang up job of storing and keeping my yarn organized!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: A shoe hoarder (like me) heaven! Fit all of ...
customer_reviews.text: A shoe hoarder (like me) heaven! Fit all of my shoes! And the top it durable enough to stack a few boxes on the top of it! I took out an extra shelf so I can put my boots on the bottom row. I store this in the garage and because of its ability to close it up, it is very asthetically appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to assemble but EXCELLENT for shoe storage. No more closet floor mess of shoes. If you collect shoes like I do this is the way to go. The depth is perfect for my mens size 9 shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: dayno1220

customer_reviews.title: Shoes organized and looking great
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful item! Looks terrific and it has made my shoes look like a good and organized collection. When putting this together be sure to tap the tubes in all the way. We used a wood mallet and tapped gently. It turned out sturdy and straight. The cover is also great. A very good investment. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LLM

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but a few things to consider
customer_reviews.text: Great show rack. LOTS of pieces to put together. Each rack has about 9 parts to put together. The shel fit normal size shoes but not large shoes like Tims or J’s. I just payed them flat and it was fine. Good buy if you don’t have a lot of big bulky shoes or really high heels.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mosby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I highly recommend it. - Affordable - Easy to assemble - Sturdy - Can hold over 40 pairs of shoes and other things
customer_reviews.author: FAITH

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is quick and easy. The structure is surprisingly stiff and strong
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is quick and easy. The structure is surprisingly stiff and strong. I have my loaded with mens shoes, size 10, and I get 4 pairs on each level. Fits nicely into an apartment closet. I hope it lasts! If it starts to bow or sag I will make an update. Love it for now!
customer_reviews.author: RoyWilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this Shoe Rack Holds A Lot!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe rack. So easy to put together everything was in great condition. No rips or tears in cover. Holds all my 24 pairs of sneakers also room for my flip flops, slippers, but not my work boots. I have another rack for them. The cover makes it look so nice in my Bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Souza

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: At first, we were skeptical of the sturdiess of the product, since it constructed rods and fabric. But after building the entire rack, even at 10 levels high, the rack is very sturdy and move around. It is also very light, so moving in around is super easy. It will fit most shoes, but for some taller boot, they need to put onto it side ways. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zhi Wang

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest thing to put together, but I bought because I have a puppy that likes to chew on shoes. Very sturdy and holds a lot of shoes. Even though not the easiest thing to put together well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, can be used to hold other things beside shoes. Spacious.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this as an additional tshirt “dresser”. It is holding over a hundred tshirts (folded into 4ths). The space is perfect, and we still have room for more. I’m sure it would hold a of shoes as well. The set up was easy, and it’s nice that the cover comes down when not in use. Recommend anyone who would need additional dresser space.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bowlds

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The only bad part was that one of the side pockets was ripped off. Should be Easy enough to fix tho.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Burke

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this I have it in my closet and it hold all my shoes! I have four dogs so I’m constantly vacuuming. Since it has a zip down cover I never have to worry about dog hair or dust getting in and on my shoes. The only bad thing is I wish the shelves were not cloth because sometimes my shoes fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie escoto

customer_reviews.title: All your shoes in one place and no dust.
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my grown son who had 30 plus pairs of Air Jordons and other shoes under his bed. Now he just opens this shoe rack up and what ever pair he wants to wear with a certain outfit is right there with in one reach. No more flash light digging under the bed. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Wedding

customer_reviews.title: Better used as a clothing storage rack
customer_reviews.text: Good for tennis shoes and low pumps. Wife wears 4 inch plus heels and the heel busts through the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: robert adams

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than I even thought it could be. Solved my storage issue and I've had several friends admire it and inquire where to get themselves one. Really happy with this purchase. Super easy to assemble. Holds 4 pairs each row, total 36 pairs. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. John Carter

customer_reviews.title: This product is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for the price. Easy to assemble and well design. The only downfall is that the materials aren't sturdy. Being that it is just sheets, it does not hold a lot of shoes. I like to use the philosophy, image stretching your shirt and putting shoes on top.
customer_reviews.author: Tou Y. Vang

customer_reviews.title: The color and the assemble
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product. Holds my husband shoes. And keep the dust off them and easy to grab a pair too wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shona Best

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent product. Works well with what I needed. It is steady and seems like it will last for at least a few years. All the connecting pieces are plastic so I don’t expect it to last more than a few years. Overall for the price it’s not a bad deal but it’s not the most sturdy or pretty shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: Clarie

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it.. got a moderate amount of shoes.. then get this.. its great. easy to put together. just pay a little attention.look at the picture and a child could do it..i did it while watching netflix..your shoes are off the floor and neatly covered and put away and out of sight. only got 4 stars because im six feet tall and i wish it came even higher. no good for boots though. mine is placed against a wall. i have no idea how sturdy it is free standing. your guest will not know whats inside once you zip it up,,they will just know its storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lost pets maybe hiding here and no sharp heels
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but also very easy to tear. Shoes with sharp heals is a no-no. And when I lost my cat for hours, I found she had climbed up in it and it appeared she tried to eat a few pieces out of it. But all in all I love it and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Tara King

customer_reviews.title: Organized My Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My shoes were everywhere! This shoe rack got me organized. I can actually see what I have now. Bonus: it was very easy to assemble. I love that I can close the front to for a “clean” look, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together Perfect for shoes and purses Fits a lot of items Dust cover is a great idea
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I like it so much that im going to order another. For my winter shoes and boots.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty sturdy and easy to put together. We have big feet in this house and it fit all our shoes. I do feel like I paid too much for it though
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: It's great but...
customer_reviews.text: It's great! But the strap that keeps the flap up was missing. It's not worth going through the trouble of sending it back for a new one since it took a while to set up alone, but now I have to fold it over the top and it's just ugly. It's sad that you have to do this, but make sure all the pieces are there before putting it together just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cloth cover poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cloth like cover is very poor quality. The zipper flap on the front does not have the option to roll up and clip up as shown in the picture. Cloth cover had a small slit that I didn’t notice until I spent one hour putting together. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super duper product. Beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Took at least 45 pairs of shoes and slippers. Trick is to keep all your shoes and snow boots in their original box. Rack height does not take snow boots. More sturdy stuff can only be a steel rack.
customer_reviews.author: APPS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars becaise the product works really good. It solved my and may wifes problem with storing shoes. Each rack takes around five to six pairs it dependes the size. The assembling is easy, takes a bit of time but the result is worth. I dont think that will least many assamblings for this reason avoid disarm the rack once ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: jonas

customer_reviews.title: i really like it! Its sturdier than I figured it would ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and put it together and I must say, i really like it! Its sturdier than I figured it would be and pretty simple to put together. It hides my shoes that were just laying around and makes my bedroom look much more organized. Its not very pretty and would be much prettier with a decorative cover but it serves the purpose! I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Finally put my Shoe Rack together. Assembly is fairly easy, but I'm missing 2 part "A" rods to assemble top shelf that supports dust cover. I have 2 extra "D" corner parts. Shoe rack is unsteady and cannot use top shelf. How do I get replacement parts? Update: Thank you service@songmics.com for reaching out to me so quickly; I'm already working with Amazon on getting the replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Pat D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and it is sturdy. I have found that heels do not sit well on the shelves (unless in boxes), but I fit so many pairs of shoes on this.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Fit all of my shoes. I was looking for a product like this for a while now. it doesnt take too much space in my studio apartment. It housed all my shoes quite nicely and very sturdy. I thought it will be flimsy but no, it held a lot and its not wobbly or anything. Its so nice since you can cover it or leave it open with the flap that comes with it. SO PLEASED WITH THIS
customer_reviews.author: Newpro

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous, absolutely great keeps the shoes clean, lightweight and very durable. Holds a lot of shoes & I also put some of my hand bags in & tall boots fit nicely on top.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage with easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this storage for my shoes and boots. Also suitable for shirts or sweaters if you wanted. Very easy to assemble and sturdy enough for many heavy shoes and boots. Loved so much I bought for my sister in law too. Love the dust cover also, because I have cats and this keeps everything from getting dusty or cat hair covered.
customer_reviews.author: cshn13

product_meta.title: SONGMICS 10 Tiers Shoe Rack with Dustproof Cover Closet Shoe Storage Cabinet Organizer Grey URXJ36G
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey

This SONGMICS 10-tier Dustproof Shoe Rack is designed to provide a great storage solution for your collection of favorite footwear. It is constructed out of metal pipes, non-woven fabrics and plastic connectors, so it can hold numerous pairs of shoes. This innovative, lightweight space saving shoe rack can be placed in a cubby closet, mudroom or busy entryway to keep shoes or accessories accessible.

Each shelf holds up to 3 or 4 pairs of full-size shoes; Side pockets for shoe brushes, keys, toys or other sundries. With zippered cover, this elegant shoe cabinet will keep the dust away and when guests coming, you can just zip down the cover to keep your shoes unviewable.

Specifications: 
- Fabric Material: Non-woven Fabric
- Pipe Material: Steel Tube 
- Connector Material: PP Plastic
- Fabric Color: Grey
- Product Size: 34 5/8"L x 11 1/8"W x 60 7/8"H (88 x 28 x 160cm) 
- Layer Height: 6 3/4” (17cm) 
- Weight: 6.6lb (3kg)

Package Contents: 
- 1 x Shoe Rack
- 1 x Instruction
feature_bullets: AWAY FROM DUST: Want to give your delicate shoes more protection? No worries, SONGMICS has you covered! Yes, the fabric coat of the shoe rack equipped with a zipper and hook-and-loop fasteners is handpicked to store your shoes properly
STABILITY ABOVE ALL: Supported by metal tubes and 75 g/m² non-woven fabric, this shoe organizer is stable, sturdy, and holds up to 6.6 lb on each tier, ensuring a safe home for your beloved shoes
SERVE MANY PLACES: Your hallway, cloakroom, and entryway—wherever you set this shoe rack, it’ll turn the messy piles of shoes into a neat, tidy look and bring the order back

ASSEMBLY? EASY PEASY! No more spending hours putting a shoe rack together; the assembly here is all about attaching the tubes into the plastic connectors. The next thing you’re going to do is put your 4-5 pairs of shoes on each tier
WHAT YOU GET: A sturdy shoe rack with 10 shelves with a cover, easy assembly and customizable design, and a solution to tame the shoes scattered in the entrance and walk-in closet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,419 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
